title: Herbal Anti-Stress Spray — Lavender + Ashwagandha Hydrosol
excerpt: A calming spray combining lavender hydrosol, ashwagandha infusion, and rose water to reduce stress and promote relaxation in pillow, office, or meditation spaces.
content:
## What Is This Anti-Stress Spray?
A gentle, non-aerosol room and linen spray made from lavender hydrosol, an ashwagandha-infused water (hydrosol), and rose water to support relaxation, reduce stress, and prepare the mind for sleep or meditation.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Lavender soothes the nervous system, while ashwagandha adds subtle adaptogenic calm. Rose water lifts mood and cools Pitta, creating a balanced, calming aromatic profile.

### Key Benefits
- Reduces stress and supports restful sleep.
- Ideal for pillow, workspace, or meditation area.
- Alcohol-free hydrosol format safe for linens and pillows.

## Ingredients
- Lavender hydrosol
- Ashwagandha-infused hydrosol
- Rose water

## Usage Instructions
- Mist lightly on pillow, linens, or room before sleep or meditation. Avoid direct misting on skin or fabrics that may stain; do a fabric patch test if unsure.

## Packaging
- Recyclable spray bottle with safety and fabric notes.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid direct spraying near eyes. Consult a healthcare provider if pregnant or highly sensitive to herbal aromas.

## Why Choose This Spray?
A thoughtfully balanced, gentle spray using hydrosols rather than alcohol or synthetic fragrances—perfect for everyday calming rituals.
